title: Beyoncé and Miley Cyrus Perform “II Most Wanted” in Paris: Watch
description: Marking the first time they've performed their Grammy-winning collaboration live. Beyoncé and Miley Cyrus Perform “II Most Wanted” in Paris: Watch Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Beyoncé welcomed Miley Cyrus to the Cowboy Carter Tour in Paris, where the two pop powerhouses performed their Grammy-winning collaboration “II Most Wanted” live for the first time.
text: Beyoncé welcomed Miley Cyrus to the “Cowboy Carter Tour” in Paris on Thursday night, where the two pop powerhouses performed their Grammy-winning collaboration “II Most Wanted” live for the first time. Watch fan-captured footage below. Get Beyoncé Tickets Here The “Cowboy Carter Tour” returns to US later this month, beginning with two dates in Queen Bey’s hometown of Houston on June 28th and June 29th. She’s also due to play concerts in Washington, DC, Atlanta, and Las Vegas in July. Look for last-minute tickets here. BEYONCÉ AND MILEY CYRUS PERFORMING “II MOST WANTED” AT COWBOY CARTER TOUR IN PARIS pic.twitter.com/msqIG1xSJi — pop culture gal (@allurequinn) June 19, 2025
html:
Beyoncé welcomed Miley Cyrus to the “Cowboy Carter Tour” in Paris on Thursday night, where the two pop powerhouses performed their Grammy-winning collaboration “II Most Wanted” live for the first time. Watch fan-captured footage below.

Get Beyoncé Tickets Here

The “Cowboy Carter Tour” returns to US later this month, beginning with two dates in Queen Bey’s hometown of Houston on June 28th and June 29th. She’s also due to play concerts in Washington, DC, Atlanta, and Las Vegas in July. Look for last-minute tickets here.

BEYONCÉ AND MILEY CYRUS PERFORMING “II MOST WANTED” AT COWBOY CARTER TOUR IN PARIS pic.twitter.com/msqIG1xSJi

— pop culture gal (@allurequinn) June 19, 2025
